books.title: The Little Prince
books.author: Antoine de Saint-Exup√©ry
books.summary: A young prince from another planet explores the universe, learning about the peculiarities of adult behavior through various adventures.

books.title: Don Quixote
books.author: Miguel de Cervantes
books.summary: The story follows Alonso Quixano who reads so many chivalric romances that he loses his mind and decides to become a knight-errant, roaming in search of adventure.

books.title: And Then There Were None
books.author: Agatha Christie
books.summary: Ten people, each with something to hide and something to fear, are invited to a isolated mansion on Indian Island by a host who, surprisingly, fails to appear.

books.title: The Book of Daniel
books.author: Aaron Smith
books.summary: An exploration of faith, legacy, and prophecy through a modern lens.

books.title: Song of Myself
books.author: Walt Whitman
books.summary: One of America's most influential poems and it remains an essential part of the American literary tradition.

books.title: Tom Sawyer
books.author: Mark Twain
books.summary: The story of a boy's adventures along the Mississippi River, and his encounters with danger and excitement.

books.title: Letters From Earth
books.author: Mark Twain
books.summary: Posthumous work of celebrated American author Mark Twain, observing the planet Earth from the outsider's perspective of Satan.

books.title: Oliver Twist
books.author: Charles Dickens
books.summary: The tale of a young orphan boy who endures hardships in early Victorian England.
